# Introduction

Tutorial to manage data on Amazon Web Service (AWS).

## Login

Go on [AWS website](https://aws.amazon.com/) and choose 'Sign In to the Console'. Then, choose 'Sign in as IAM user'. The Sauri account ID is <b>``r aws.account.id``</b>, the IAM user name is <b>``r aws.iam.user.name``</b>. You will also have to write your password.

<div style="width:300px; height:300px; margin: auto">
![](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/zoometh/Sauri/main/dev/aws/user_iam_auth.png)
</div>

You only have the possibility to access the S3 buckets^[these are folders]. Click on the S3 icon

<div style="width:400px; height:400px; margin: auto">
![](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/zoometh/Sauri/main/dev/aws/user_iam_s3.png)
</div>

Within the S3 buckets, choose <b>``r aws.sauri.s3``</b>

<div style="width:700px; height:400px; margin: auto">
![](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/zoometh/Sauri/main/dev/aws/user_iam_s3_sauri-pallars.png)
</div>


You can compute various action on the `r aws.sauri.s3` S3 bucket: upload new files, delete files, download, etc.
